Learn How You Can Use AI as Written Communication Tools

This page offers insights into using AI for writing tasks. From content creation to automated proofreading, it equips users with skills to leverage AI effectively.

Knowledge and sharing tools on how AI is utilized as written communication tools will be discussed by our teams to fulfilled the professional ethics assignments for CCIT 4SE1 class.

Here's the article our team has crafted for you to enhance your understanding of "How You Can Use AI as Written Communication Tools."

Best practice to make AI your communication copilot

AI Communication Copilot is a tool that utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to assist you in enhancing communication across various aspects, such as writing emails, composing presentations, and negotiating.

Respond to messages using Flowrite AI

Flowrite AI is a tool for automating email communication supported by AI. Users can provide brief written instructions about the content and purpose of the message, and Flowrite will automatically create professional emails in seconds.

M. Rajiful
Read more

AI for Email Automation with Levity.AI

Levity.AI is a powerful AI platform that can help companies automate their email tasks and improve the efficiency, accuracy, and scalability of their email communications. Levity.AI offers various pricing packages to meet your needs.

M. Alfi
Read more

Using AI for Real-Time Note-taking

Studyfetch AI is an AI platform that helps you take real-time notes during meetings, classes, or presentations. Studyfetch AI is a powerful AI platform that can help you take notes in real-time more easily and effectively.

M. Nathan
Read more

Supporting Academic Writing with AI

Jenni AI is a powerful AI platform that can significantly assist students and researchers in academic writing. It offers a comprehensive suite of features that can help you improve writing quality.
